amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for Ground-Based Midcourse Defense systems by $100,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 64 printed in House Report 112-88 to reduce the funding for Ground-based Midcourse Defense systems by $100,000,000.

action.text: Amendment (A036) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 234 (Roll no. 369).
